Document:
# Ammunition Ammunition is used for firearms.Some types are weaker,others are stronger.Below,you'll find a list of the most common ammo types,how much damage they deal,and which weapons they're used with.
5.56mm - Deals 19 piercing damage.Used by light machine gun,R-91 Rifle,assault carbine,
7.62mm - Deals 23 piercing damage.Used by canadian HMG,chinese assault rifle,
9mm - Deals 12 piercing damage.Used by 9mm Pistol,9mm revolver,chinese pistol,
10mm - Deals 14 piercing damage.Used by 10mm Pistol,10mm pipe pistol,10mm revolver,
12.7mm - Deals 18 piercing damage.Used by 12.7mm pipe SMG,12.7mm SMG,douglas advanced SMG,
12 gauge - Deals 10 piercing damage.Used by shotgun,double-barrel shotgun,sawed-off shotgun,
20 gauge - Deals 8 piercing damage.Used by riot shotgun,lever action shotgun,
.22lr - Deals 8 piercing damage.Used by 22lr Pistol
.44 magnum - Deals 30 piercing damage and 5 blunt.Used by webley revolver,magnum revolver,tribal handgun,
45-70 gov't - Deals 35 piercing damage and 5 blunt.Used by handcannon,hunting revolver,
.45 auto - Deals 16 piercing damage.Used by .45 SMG,.45 colt handgun
.50 AP anti-materiel - Deals 30 piercing damage and 20 blunt damage.Used by .50 pipe rifle,.50 NCR rifle,Anti-Materiel rifle
.308 rifle - Deals 38 piercing damage.Used by master huntstick,pipe rifle,lever action rifle,
